entry.title: Uniswap Buys Marketplace Genie to Integrate NFT Trading Into its DEX The acquisition amount was not disclosed.
entry.summary: Uniswap Labs is planning to integrate NFTs into the largest decentralized exchange via the acquisition of Genie, an NFT marketplace aggregator, according to a post on the companyâ€™s website.
